name: Battle Royale Bootcamp
description: Battle Royale Bootcamp is an action-packed battle royale aim trainer. Train your reflexes, aim, recoil control and awareness before you hit your favourite online multiplayer BR games!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10. Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 6000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB Storage: 8000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
